name: James Michael Tyler
info:
• 简体中文名: 詹姆斯·迈克尔·泰勒
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1962-05-28
detail: James Michael Tyler (born May 28, 1962) is an American actor best known for his role as Gunther on the NBC sitcom Friends.
